meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Starr Spokesman Charged The former spokesman for Kenneth W. Starr, the independent counsel who brought impeachment charges against President Clinton, has been charged with criminal contempt for news leaks. PAGE A10

Starr Spokesman Charged The former spokesman for Kenneth W. Starr, the independent counsel who brought impeachment charges against President Clinton, has been charged with criminal contempt for news leaks. PAGE A10
Gore Hits Bush on Medicare; Bradley to Offer His Support Vice President Al Gore sharply contrasted his Medicare proposals with those of Gov. George W. Bush.
Democratic officials said Bill Bradley would offer Mr. Gore his ''enthusiastic support'' next week. PAGE A14

Equal AIDS-Vaccine Access Researchers issued a blueprint for more equal future access to a preventive vaccine for AIDS in rich and poor countries, saying it is not too soon to take such steps. PAGE A8
Discovery in Erving Case Police in Seminole County, Florida, found a submerged car and said the body inside matched the description of Cory Erving, the missing son of Julius Erving. PAGE D5
